properties.name: connect_timeout
properties.description: Connect timeout in seconds, default value is 5.

properties.name: network_timeout
properties.description: Network timeout in seconds, default value is 30.

properties.name: http_anti_steal_token
properties.description: If use token to anti-steal, default value is false (0).

properties.name: http_secret_key
properties.description: Secret key to generate anti-steal token, this parameter must be set when http.anti_steal.check_token set to true, the length of the secret key should not exceed 128 bytes.

properties.name: http_tracker_http_port
properties.description: Tracker server http port, default value is 80.

properties.name: tracker_server
properties.description: Tracker server ip address, use commas(,) to separate multiple names, default value is 192.168.80.3:22122.

properties.name: tracker_server_max_total
properties.description: Tracker server connection pool max total, default value is 18.

properties.name: storage_client_max_total
properties.description: Storage client connection pool max total, default value is 18.

properties.name: tracker_server_max_idle
properties.description: Tracker server connection pool max idle, default value is 18.

properties.name: storage_client_max_idle
properties.description: Storage client connection pool max idle, default value is 18.

properties.name: tracker_server_min_idle
properties.description: Tracker server connection pool min idle, default value is 3.

properties.name: storage_client_min_idle
properties.description: Storage client connection pool min idle, default value is 3.
